titles.title: Protection of Women in Olympic and Amateur Sports Act
Protection of Women in Olympic and Amateur Sports Act
A bill to modify eligibility requirements for amateur sports governing organizations.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary:
Protection of Women in Olympic and Amateur Sports Act
This bill requires certified national governing bodies (NGBs) of amateur sports (e.g., USA Gymnastics) to prohibit a person whose sex is male from participating in an amateur athletic competition that is designated for females, women, or girls.
Under the bill, male means an individual who has, had, will haveâ€”or would have, but for a developmental or genetic anomaly or historical accidentâ€”the reproductive system that at some point produces, transports, and utilizes sperm for fertilization.
